title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Schedule Of Events
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Schedule Of Events              Schedule Of Events         Park staff showcase the stories of the park   2016 Schedule of Activities What an exciting year of  activities we have planned at Cumberland Gap National Historical Park.  Hear the echoes of 18th Century Colonial America...Speak with Native Americans and oncoming Europeans as they whisper to us their values and dreams at An American Memoir on April 9th - 11th.  This is your moment to witness why our ancestors made decisions that would alter the course of American history.  Then, reflect on your role in the future of America, and the legacies that we will leave to our grandchildren.  Join us for the Cumberland Gap National Historic Park quarter release on April 11th and don't forget about the acclaimed Hikes of the Month.  This is but a sampling of the “Oh My Gosh” programs being offered! 2016 Schedule of Programs and Activities           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 6 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Cumberland Gap National Historical Park Gap Cave tours      Time: 10:00 AM,2:00 PM Location: tours meet at the Daniel Boone parking area Fees: $8.00 for adults, $4.00 for seniors with a senior pass, $4.00 for children aged 5 through 12     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Everyday  from 05/29/2016 to 09/03/2016 Ranger guided tours of spectacular Gap Cave View Details      Cumberland Gap National Historical Park Hensley Settlement Tours      Time: 12:30 PM to 4:30 PM Location: Tours depart from the visitor center Fees: $10.00 adults, $5.00 seniors with a senior pass, $5.00 children 12 and under     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Every Sunday Weekly & Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 05/15/2016 to 10/30/2016 Ranger led tours of the historic Hensley Settlement View Details      Cumberland Gap National Historical Park Hensley Settlement Tours      Time: 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM Location: tours meet at the park visitor center Fees: $10.00 for adults, $5.00 for seniors with a senior pass, $5.00 for children 12 and under     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly & Every Wednesday Weekly & Every Friday Weekly & Every Saturday Weekly  from 05/16/2016 to 10/31/2016 Ranger guided tours of the historic Hensley Settlement View Details      Cumberland Gap National Historical Park Cumberland Mountain Photography Club      Location: Visitor Center     Thursday, September 1, 2016 Every 1st Thursday of every month. from 03/03/2016 to 12/01/2016 Cumberland Mountain Photography Club meeting -
